skills.name: Uppercut
skills.description: Strikes and provokes the enemy for 1 turn with a 50% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skills.name: Cry of Battlefield
skills.description: Increases the Attack Power of all allies for 2 turns and removes 2 harmful effects.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.name: Up-down Attack
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times with each attack having a 30% chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: 2.6*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.13*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
